metadata.title: CVE-2015-5342 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The choice module in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.11, 2.8.xbefore 2.8.9, and 2.9.x before 2.9.3 allows remote authenticated users tobypass intended access restrictions by visiting a URL to add or deleteresponses in the closed state.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5342` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.11+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.11+dfsg-2').
